title: Worlds Group Stage Day 8 MEGATHREAD
body: With TSM shitting the bed, cloud 9 is the NA last hope in worlds. I MAY's support "Road" has been banned for one match due to toxicity, so they had to rush some noob in to fill for him. I think SKT and Cloud 9 will leave groups though. Maybe Jensen can finally clap faker this time. Who knows though? It might be Flash Wolves and I May getting out. This whole week has been a wildcard.
